Class ProvidedSlotContext

Represents a slot provided by a particle through a provide connection or one of the root slots provided by the shell. Holds container (eg div element) and its additional info. Must be initialized either with a container (for root slots provided by the shell) or tuple of sourceSlotConsumer and spec (ProvidedSlotSpec) of the slot.
